decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with the drawings and documents title number(s):  21035 133 PA110 Design & Access Statement; 21035 133 PA210 Heritage Statement; 21035 133 PA 00 Location & Block Plan; 21035 133 PA 03 Existing Elevation & Details 01; 21035 133 PA 04 Existing Elevation & Details 02; 21035 133 PA 23 Proposed Elevation & Details 01; 21035 133 PA 24 Proposed Elevation & Details 02; 21035 133 PA 10 Photosheet; Reasonable Exception Statement (RES); Flood map for planning (Location 517903/180785) dated 12 Jan 2024
Reason:  For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Replacement of two existing external ATMs use class (E(c)(i)) for two new machines together with internal alterations to the branch to accommodate other new multi-functional devices.
